articles.author: Silvia Amaro
articles.title: YouTube faces close scrutiny in Europe’s new Google probe - CNBC
articles.description: "YouTube has a strong market position. It is possible that Google makes use of that to favor his services," a source familiar with the investigation told CNBC.
articles.content:
The logo of video-sharing website YouTube is displayed on a smartphone on November 19, 2018 in Berlin, Germany.
LONDON It's Europe's fourth big investigation into Google, and this time video-sharing… [+3928 chars]

articles.author: Alex Richards
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo, Bruno Fernandes and Portugal's Euro 2020 failure - The Mirror
articles.description: Portugal's hopes of making it back to back European titles were sunk in Seville, as Cristiano Ronaldo and co couldn't take advantage of a lacklustre Belgium performance
articles.content: Failure. Its a harsh, ruthless word.In many ways, Portugal didnt fail in their Euro 2020 last 16 showdown with the worlds number one ranked side, Belgium.They held the attack of their much-vaunted op… [+6487 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Mask-free and 'low risk', Italy welcomes milestone - CNA
articles.description: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday, marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.
articles.content: ROME: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday (Jun 28), marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.… [+2224 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Mask-free and 'low risk', Italy welcomes milestone - New Straits Times
articles.description: ROME: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday, marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.
